TheMinistryOfUtmostHappiness: As much as I wanted to love it, I have to admit I had to force myself finishing it
Too many ideas and characters into one novel, which could have been easily cut into two separate books
Instead the writer went into the 'pulp fiction'/'amores person/'Babel' way
The first half is probably the better one although this part also lacks the intimacy of her first novel (the god of small things)
